channel.title: App Store on Noverse
channel.description: Recent content in App Store on Noverse

item.title: TimeToCall Released to the App Store
item.description: Noverse is very pleased to announce that TimeToCall v1.0 has shipped and can be downloaded on the App Store. TimeToCall is a universal iPhone and iPad application to help you choose the best time to call people in other countries based on timezones. Over 4000 locations to choose from Multiple Times to Call to lots of places Choose a Time to Call from different places Get a feel for when they are awake or asleep Play with Time to find the best Time to Call Available in Japanese as そっちは何時 Universal: iPhone or iPad (iOS 5.
